traits.name: Limited Telepathy
description: The pseudodragon can communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with its master while within 100 feet.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
description: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Companion Bond
description: The pseudodragon acts on its master's initiative. It obeys verbal commands (no action required).
If the master is incapacitated, the pseudodragon prioritizes evasion, warning allies, and defending its master.

traits.name: Venomous Sting
description: The pseudodragon's sting carries potent magical venom.
A creature that fails its saving throw against this venom falls unconscious as described in the Sting attack.

traits.name: Flight
description: The pseudodragon has a flying speed of 60 feet.
